title: I got S but no Level 6 token?
body: How come when I have gotten several S ratings I don't always get the token? I'm level 5 with lee sin and have gotten like 2 tokens out of 7 S rate games

replies.body:
If you have gotten 2 level 6 tokens with Lee Sin, then you will be unable to get anymore. You only need 2 tokens to advance to mastery level 6, so any extra will be useless.

EDIT: Damn, beaten by Porocles. :)

Once you've obtained the required tokens, there's no reason to obtain more.  When you reach two, you can use them to level to the next level mastery.  There are no benefits for receiving more than 2 tokens, so an account won't exceed that limit.  Our [Champion Mastery](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/204211284-Champion-Mastery-Guide#h1q5) guide can provide some more information, but you're just about ready to level up!  Congrats.  :)
You have to go to the hextech crafting screen and craft the rank 6 :) Took me a bit to realize this lol
